How it works?

Simply explore our website and search for a hospital by the country of your choice or the procedure you are looking for, submit your details, then sit back and wait for the hospitals to bid for your procedure. 

Search by country or required procedure.

Login and submit your personal details.

Wait 48 hours for hospitals to bid.

Select the hospital that suit your needs.
